TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit EntityDescriptor extends System.Data.Services.Client.Descriptor
Public NotInheritable Class EntityDescriptor Inherits Descriptor

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Diagnostics.DebuggerDisplay("State = {state}, Uri = {editLink}, Element = {entity.GetType().ToString()}")]
[<System.Diagnostics.DebuggerDisplay("State = {state}, Uri = {editLink}, Element = {entity.GetType().ToString()}")>]

summary.span: 由 中返回的操作对实体进行的修改的说明。

span.span: Description of modifications done to entities by operations returned in a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回了 对象，它包含一系列 对象，其中每个对象均包含一系列表示已保存更改的 或 实例。The method returns a object that contains a series of objects each of which contains a sequence of or instances that represent changes that were persisted. 对于成功的操作，描述符的 属性将设置为未更改，而插入和更新操作的新值将根据合并设置进行合并。For successful operations, the property of the descriptor will be set to unchanged and the new values for insert and update operations will be merged according to the merge settings. 对于有错误的操作，描述符的 将仍保持与调用 之前相同。For operations with errors, the of the descriptor will remain the same as it was before was called. 如果在操作期间出错并且停止处理，则 将保持不变。If an error occurred and processing stopped during an operation, the will remain unchanged.

span.span: The edit link URI for the entity resource.

span.span: The property contains the edit-media link URI for the Media Resource that is associated with the entity, which is a Media Link Entry.

public: property System::String ^ ETag { System::String ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: [get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: 获取 eTag 值，该值指示自上次调用 以来预期要更新的数据的状态。

span.span: Gets an eTag value that indicates the state of data targeted for update since the last call to .

value.span: 用于指示数据状态的字符串值。

span.span: A string value that indicates the state of data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与实体关联的 eTag 用于表示原始值，以便根据 HTTP [RFC 2616](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=114956)中的 eTag 规则用于开放式并发检查。The eTag associated with the entity is used to represent original values for use with optimistic concurrency checks according to eTag rules in HTTP [RFC 2616](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=114956). 该值可能为空或 null。The value may be empty or null. Null 表示当前没有 eTag 与实体相关联。Null represents the case in which no eTag is currently associated with the entity.

summary.span: 获取与作为媒体链接入口的实体相关联的媒体资源的 eTag。

span.span: Gets the eTag for the media resource associated with an entity that is a media link entry.

value.span: 用于指示数据状态的字符串值。

span.span: A string value that indicates the state of data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当实体作为媒体链接入口时， 属性会返回一个 eTag 值，该值指示自上次调用 以来预期要更新的媒体资源的状态。The property returns an eTag value that indicates the state of the Media Resource targeted for update since the last call to when the entity is a media link entry. 与媒体资源相关联的 eTag 用于表示原始值，以便根据 HTTP [RFC 2616](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=114956)中的 eTag 规则用于开放式并发检查。The eTag associated with the media resource is used to represent original values for use with optimistic concurrency checks according to eTag rules in HTTP [RFC 2616](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=114956). 该值可能为空或 null。The value may be empty or null. Null 表示当前没有 eTag 与媒体资源相关联。Null represents the case in which no eTag is currently associated with the Media Resource.
